name: From TV Animation Slam Dunk 2: Zenkoku e no Tip Off
overview: This title plays much like Slam Dunk: Gakeppuchi no Kesshou League, but there are options to choose the basketball team, the game mode and how many minutes each match should last. Close-ups of defense, tackling opponents and scoring and now shown in side-view. Scoring points depends on the player getting the basketball on the linear target.
